about_the_game:
【 Featured gameplay 】
Cross server competition, highly strategic competition
Top players from different regional servers can enter the same arena for a one-on-one battle. And each player needs to send up to 5 teams of 25 generals for a battle of three wins in five innings. Not only are there peak battles between top tier teams. Among them, there are complex strategic decisions, such as using weak teams as abandoned children to ensure victory, just like Tian Ji did in horse racing; Still not encouraging at all, he fought head-on to snatch the strongest name from the strong. This is all in your hands.

Xiangyang City Battle, Heroes of the Three Kingdoms Gather Together
Players from three factions gather in the Xiangyang Battle Map, with the goal of capturing and defending the main hall of Xiangyang City. This is not only a battle of strength between countries, but also a test of the execution decisions of the kings of various countries. It can be a "Sun Liu alliance" that rejects strong enemies, or it can be a combination of both sides, suppressing the strong and supporting the weak. This new chapter of the Three Kingdoms is written by players.

Achieve great achievements, rank as a wolf and win the position of general
With four growth lines for official positions, players can choose to ascend and change their official position types at any time. The rise of official positions will also bring more privileges, ultimately becoming powerful officials above one person and below ten thousand people.
detailed_description:
【 Featured gameplay 】
Cross server competition, highly strategic competition
Top players from different regional servers can enter the same arena for a one-on-one battle. And each player needs to send up to 5 teams of 25 generals for a battle of three wins in five innings. Not only are there peak battles between top tier teams. Among them, there are complex strategic decisions, such as using weak teams as abandoned children to ensure victory, just like Tian Ji did in horse racing; Still not encouraging at all, he fought head-on to snatch the strongest name from the strong. This is all in your hands.

Xiangyang City Battle, Heroes of the Three Kingdoms Gather Together
Players from three factions gather in the Xiangyang Battle Map, with the goal of capturing and defending the main hall of Xiangyang City. This is not only a battle of strength between countries, but also a test of the execution decisions of the kings of various countries. It can be a "Sun Liu alliance" that rejects strong enemies, or it can be a combination of both sides, suppressing the strong and supporting the weak. This new chapter of the Three Kingdoms is written by players.

Achieve great achievements, rank as a wolf and win the position of general
With four growth lines for official positions, players can choose to ascend and change their official position types at any time. The rise of official positions will also bring more privileges, ultimately becoming powerful officials above one person and below ten thousand people.
name: 三国：我是主公

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Core I3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Core I5
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: A war strategy game set against the backdrop of the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms, where you can collect many famous generals from the Three Kingdoms for cultivation, meet other players to form alliances, collaborate and conquer the world, and write your own legendary epic.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Russian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Turkish*, Greek*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Japanese*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*, Korean*, Uzbek*, Urdu*, Armenian*, Igbo*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Croatian*, Icelandic*, Cherokee*, Galician*, Catalan*, Afrikaans*, Kannada*, Luxembourgish*, Hindi*, Gujarati*, Kyrgyz*, Kazakh*, Turkmen*, K'iche'*, Kinyarwanda*, Tajik*, Serbian*, Odia*, Welsh*, Konkani*, Bangla*, Nepali*, Basque*, Hebrew*, Latvian*, Tigrinya*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Swahili*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Georgian*, Maori*, Wolof*, Bosnian*, Persian*, Telugu*, Tamil*, Irish*, Estonian*, Valencian*, Belarusian*, Quechua*, Zulu*, Xhosa*, Lithuanian*, Sotho*, Sorani*, Yoruba*, Uyghur*, Scots*, Tswana*, Filipino*, Mongolian*, Hausa*, Dari*, Azerbaijani*, Amharic*, Albanian*, Assamese*, Tatar*, Macedonian*, Marathi*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Khmer*
*languages with full audio support
